outlets.csv.description: PRIMARY KEY; Not Nullable; Identifier field
Type: character varying; Descriptive name field; Store name with location number
Type: character varying; Geographic location of the store
Type: integer; Store size in square feet

brands.csv.description: PRIMARY KEY; Not Nullable; Identifier field
Not Nullable; Descriptive name field; Unique brand identifier name
Not Nullable; Year when the brand was establishedx

sales.csv.description: PRIMARY KEY; Not Nullable; Identifier field
FOREIGN KEY; Not Nullable; Identifier field; References outlets table
Type: date; Date/time information; Records transaction date
Type: integer; Quantity of units sold in transaction
Type: numeric;  Revenue amount; Total revenue for the transaction
Type: boolean; Boolean indicator; Indicates if sale was under promotion
Type: character varying; Descriptive name field; Brand name of the product sold
Type: character varying; Descriptive name field; Complete product name including brand and details
